title: Jeremy Bolm from Touche Amore
itunes:title: Jeremy Bolm from Touche Amore
description:
I had the pleasure of spending time with my good friend Jeremy Bolm, the vocalist of Touche Amore, discussing everything under the sun. We discuss the by products of playing in a band, personal tragedy and how independent music has shaped both our lives. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
